item.description:
Hello, I thought it be a great idea to see a classic alt. rock band, Mudhoney. They played a big part of the grunge scene in Seattle in the later 80s/early 90s. Opening for Mudhoney is White Dynomite. I thought perhaps we could meet at T Anthony's Pizza at the corner of Babcock St and Commonwealth Ave around 7 and then head over to the Paradise. Open to other suggestions as well. Will provide my contact information on the day of event. Listed below is information on the event and the bands playing that night.

Mudhoney with White Dynomite at the Boston Paradise
Friday, May 10
Doors at 8 PM; 18+ Show - Advance Box Office Price $18

http://mudhoneyonline.com/fr_splashpage.cfm

http://www.whitedynomite.com/

http://www.thedise.com/
item.name: Mudhoney
